<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2219</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2219</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Bridging the Gap: Animals and the Environment</string>
            <string language="en">Animals and the Environment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tiere und die Umgebung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Animaux et l'environnement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Animais e o ambiente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Animali e l'ambiente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζώα και το περιβάλλον</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Unitat didàctica del material 'Bridging the Gap' en què es desenvolupen les competències comunicatives i es practiquen les habilitats lingüístiques mitjançant els animals i el medi ambient. Conté enllaços a llocs d'Internet per fer un projecte. Accés restringit a usuaris edu365 i xtec.</string>
            <string language="en">Teaching unit for the resource "Bridging the Gap" which develops communicative competence and gives practice in linguistic skills on the subject of animals and the environment. It includes Internet links for doing a project.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">expressió oral</string>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
            <string language="es">expresión oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">expressió escrita</string>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
            <string language="es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtende Maßeinheit für das Hilfsmittel 
", das den Abstand" füllt, welches mitteilsame Kompetenz entwickelt 
und Praxis in den linguistischen Fähigkeiten bezüglich der Tiere und
der Umgebung gibt. Es schließt Internet-Links für das Tun 
eines Projektes ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Unité d'enseignement pour la ressource 
"établissant le lien" ce qui développe la compétence communicative 
et donne la pratique dans des qualifications linguistiques au sujet 
des animaux et de l'environnement. Il inclut des liens 
d'Internet pour faire un projet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando para o recurso "que constrói 
uma ponte sobre a abertura" qual desenvolve o competence communicative
e dá a prática em habilidades lingüísticas no assunto dos animais 
e do ambiente. Inclui as ligações do Internet para fazer um 
projeto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unità d'istruzione per la risorsa "che colma la 
lacuna" quale sviluppa la competenza comunicativa e dà la pratica 
nelle abilità linguistiche a proposito degli animali e dell'ambiente.
Include i collegamenti del Internet per fare un progetto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μονάδα διδασκαλίας για το στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς "που 
γεφυρώνει το χάσμα" που αναπτύσσει την επικοινωνιακή ικανότητα 
και δίνει την πρακτική στις γλωσσικές δεξιότητες σχετικά με το 
θέμα των ζώων και του περιβάλλοντος. Περιλαμβάνει τις 
συνδέσεις Διαδικτύου για να κάνει ένα πρόγραμμα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προφορική έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
